name: ConditionalRangeFormat
description: A format object encapsulating the conditional formats range's font, fill, borders, and other properties.

properties.name: fill
properties.description: Returns the fill object defined on the overall conditional format range.

properties.name: borders
properties.description: Collection of border objects that apply to the overall conditional format range.

properties.name: font
properties.description: Returns the font object defined on the overall conditional format range.

properties.name: numberFormat
properties.description: Represents Excel's number format code for the given range. Cleared if null is passed in.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
